preconditions.precondition: The Researcher needs to access the DMPTool interface.

successEndConditions.condition: The Researcher is presented with the cost estimate and resource requirements.

mainSequence.step: Request resource requirements input from IT Resources Estimation.
Input project details (data volume, processing power, etc.) to ITRE.
Return resource estimates to DMPTool from ITRE.
Initiate cost calculation by the Cost Calculation Module.
Request institutional pricing data from Institutional Systems.
Return pricing data to CCM from IS.
Return cost estimate to DMPTool from CCM.
Display cost estimate and resource needs to Researcher.
